title: Trump threatens tariffs on Cuba oil supply
shortDescription: Trump warned Cuba to reach an agreement with the U.S. after signing an executive order to impose tariffs on countries that supply the island with oil.

title: Will government shut down despite Trump, Dems' deal? Live updates
shortDescription: Democrats are pushing to strip money for the Department of Homeland Security, which oversees ICE and Border Patrol, from a funding bill.

title: Florida bans nurse for TikTok post about Trump's press secretary
shortDescription: A nurse is banned from working in Florida following an expletive-filled social media post wishing President Trump’s press secretary a painful child birth.

title: 'I'm an immigrant.' Melania Trump talks role, legacy at movie premiere
shortDescription: The first lady celebrated the world premiere of "Melania" and told USA TODAY that she's "proud to be an American citizen."

title: Mike Johnson says government will 'inevitably' face short shut down
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said that "logistics" for House members may force the federal government into a brief shutdown, despite a funding deal made in the Senate.

title: Trump to announce Federal Reserve Chair pick
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he plans to announce his pick for Federal Reserve Chair to replace Jerome Powell on Friday.

title: President Trump sues IRS, Treasury for $10 billion over tax return leak
shortDescription: Charles "Chaz" Littlejohn, a former IRS employee, is currently serving a five-year sentence in prison for disclosing thousands of tax returns.

title: Senate reaches DHS funding deal as shutdown looms
shortDescription: The Senate reached a deal to fund DHS for two weeks as lawmakers rush to pass a spending package by Friday to avoid a partial government shutdown.

title: What to watch amid immigration standoff between Trump, Democrats
shortDescription: Shutdowns are politically risky but Democrats feel changing winds on immigration enforcement as White House walks a new tightrope.

title: Trump mocks low-income housing plan in Pacific Palisades after fires
shortDescription: President Trump said he doesn’t want low-income housing to be constructed in Los Angeles' Pacific Palisades area after 2025 fires.

title: Trump says he wants to drive housing prices up, not down
shortDescription: Amid growing affordability concerns across the nation, President Trump said he is looking to drive housing prices further up, not down.

title: Control of Congress at play in midterm election
shortDescription: President Donald Trump campaigns for his party in the November midterm elections with a battle for control of Congress on the line this year.

title: Nicki Minaj, ¿apoyo a Trump o el perdón a crímenes de su esposo y hermano?
shortDescription: Nicki Minaj reaparece junto a Trump y reabre el debate sobre inmigración, política y su ruptura con la comunidad afroamericana en EE.UU.

title: Trump meets with full cabinet amid key talks
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with his full cabinet to discuss updates on issues such as a possible government shutdown and Venezuela talks.

title: Barron Trump 'understands politics,' first lady says. Who is he?
shortDescription: Barron Trump, the youngest son of President Donald Trump, will be featured in the upcoming documentary 'Melania.' Who is he, and how tall is he?

title: Trump says he will name next Fed chair on Friday
shortDescription: President Trump said he will announce Friday morning his nominee for Federal Reserve chair to replace Jerome Powell, whose term ends later this year.

title: Trump's Cabinet meets at White House as shutdown deadline approaches
shortDescription: President Trump holds a Cabinet meeting at the White House on Jan. 29, 2026, as the Senate weighs a spending deal to avoid another government shutdown.

title: What lawmakers had to say about FBI raid of Atlanta election facility
shortDescription: Federal investigators raided an election hub in Fulton County, Georgia for materials related to the 2020 election. What did lawmakers have to say?

title: Is Trump facing a 'second term curse'?
shortDescription: History has shown presidents in the past have faced a second-term curse. Is President Trump facing the same curse? USA TODAY's Susan Page analyzes.

title: Trump's border czar vows 'massive changes' and 'drawdown' in Minnesota
shortDescription: Tom Homan said "massive changes" are coming to Minnesota vowed to "draw down" the number of ICE and other federal authorities in the state.

title: Senate reaches DHS funding deal as shutdown looms; Trump lauds package
shortDescription: The Senate came to a deal on a DHS funding measure in an effort to avoid a partial governement shutdown.
